resources.string: This plugin compares the current settings with the default settings in /installation/db_scripts/preferences.php. If settings are listed in preferences.php that do not yet exist, they will be set.
The following variables are listed in the prefences.php, but not in the current settings:
The authorization check of the plugin failed. No menu item could be clearly identified with this URL.\n\n=> #VAR1_BOLD#
---> There is no difference in the settings.
